name: Cosmicdoom
description:
A short doom inspired first person shooter made for the Major Jam 4 game jam.

Other notes:
Backtracking is important sometimes, so do check if things have changed after a little slaughter
The bar on the top left corner is your health
The stacking boxes on the bottom right corner is your ammo, rifle being the top one and shotgun being the lower one, you can cheat to get ammo or find it on the level itself
